name: Fightttris VR
description:
Fightttris VR is the game in which you need to catch blocks, build wall, collect bonuses and attack the enemy in the funniest ways.
Be ready to strain your muscles and brain. The speed of reaction, accuracy of movement and clarity of mind - all you need to win.

Key features
  • Catch the falling blocks - use your moves to manipulate, grab and build.
  • Collect lines - stack the blocks in lines to erase them, to restore health and to damage the opponent.
  • Activate bonuses - find and eliminate bonus blocks to destroy the opponent faster and to make him cry.
  • ...
  • Laugh at your opponent - make fun and dominate!
